# imageComponents

**Instance Property**

An array of dragging image components to use to create the drag image.

## Declaration

```swift
var imageComponents: [NSDraggingImageComponent]? { get }
```

## Discussion

The array contains copies of the components. The drag does not reflect changes you make to these copies. If needed, the system calls the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDraggingItem/imageComponentsProvider] block to generate the image components.

## Drag image components

- **imageComponentsProvider**: An array of blocks that provide the dragging image components.
- **NSDraggingItem.ImageComponentKey**: Keys that identify components of a dragging image.
- **item**: The pasteboard reader or writer object dependent on the context where you use the dragging item.
